Html: Hi all, I just tryed the controls, it's great! I'm a Chinese here, could I join you guys and do something for it? I have nearly 2 years' .net development experience, and I can also be an English-to-Chinese translator.

Sounds good.

Please contact me at ascend_adm@hotmail.com and we can talk about it.

Thanks
OK, I have sent a mail to the address~
